Sentence.sentence: I remember talking with a young lawyer who was about to begin her first jury trial.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I don’t want them to suspect this is my first trial.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The fundamental fix—reshaping how care is delivered and how doctors are paid in a wasteful, abnormal system—is likely to be achieved only through trial and error and incremental ( ' ,  渐进的) gains.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I became aware of the trials of career-focused European woman a few years ago when I met a post-doctoral student from Germany who was then a visiting fellow at Johns Hopkins.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Hire Barbara Jones on a trial basis.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What did Juan ask his roommate to do when he was making his trial speech?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: During a month-long hospital trial,researchers asked 70 patients how they felt being around the robot and "only three or four said they didn't like having it around".
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I asked the lawyer again how she wanted to appear at her first trial.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I don't want them to suspect this is my first trial.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Robots are currently under a two-year trial in Wales which will train "farmbots" to herd, monitor the health of livestock, and make sure there is enough pasture for them to graze on.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: She also imagined a skillful closing argument and a winning trial.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Start with a trial program, and expect to change the details as you go.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The fundamental fix—reshaping how care is delivered and how doctors are paid in a wasteful, abnormal system—is likely to be achieved only through trial and error and incremental gains.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The study included 386 kindergarteners from schools in the Fast Track Project, a multi-site clinical trial in the U.S that in 1991 began tracking how children developed across their lives.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"试验"之意。
means: trial ： 指为观察、研究某事物以区别其真伪、优劣或效果等而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
experiment ： 多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释或说明某一理论、定理或某一观点等。
test ： 普通用词，含义广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试以估价其性质或效能等。
try ： 普通用词，多用于口语或非正式场合，指试一试。

Sentence.sentence: A six-month trial will be introduced at Holborn station from mid-April, eliminating the rule of standing on the right and walking on the left.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: A three-week trial at Holborn last year found that the number of people using escalators at any time of could be raised by almost a third.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the new trial, which will be launched from April 18, one of three "up" escalators will be standing only, with a second banning walking at peak times.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The previous trial found that escalators at the station normally carried 2, 500 people between 8:30 am and 9:30 am on a typical day, rising to 3, 250 during the researching period.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Their cooperation quickly produced results, and a few years later at jamaica's olympic trials in early 2008, Shelly-Ann, who at that time only ranked number 70 in the world, beat jamaica's unchallenged queen of the sprint.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: This new six-month trial will help US find out if we can influence customers to stand on both sides in the long term.

Sentence.sentence: With her dad's permission, she spent the next two years researching online and conducting trials to get a recipe that was both tasty and tooth-friendly.

jx.jx_en_mean: the process of experimenting with various methods of doing something until one finds the most successful
In the process of being tried, as in a court of law.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在试用中、试验性地、在受审中，如在法庭上进行的

jx.jx_en_mean: A test of one's abilities, especially the ability to perform well under pressure.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 考验：测试某人的能力，尤指在压力下正常行动的能力

entry.def: A trial is a formal meeting in a law court, at which a judge and jury listen to evidence and decide whether a person is guilty of a crime.

example.ex: New evidence showed the police lied at the trial...
example.tran: 新的证据表明警方在审讯时撒了谎。

example.ex: He's awaiting trial in a military court on charges of plotting against the state...
example.tran: 他因被控密谋颠覆国家正等待军事法庭的审判。

entry.def: A trial is an experiment in which you test something by using it or doing it for a period of time to see how well it works. If something is on trial, it is being tested in this way.

example.ex: They have been treated with this drug in clinical trials...
example.tran: 他们已在临床试验中接受过这种药物的治疗。

example.ex: I took the car out for a trial on the roads…
example.tran: 我开车上路试驾了一下。

entry.def: If someone gives you a trial for a job, or if you are on trial, you do the job for a short period of time to see if you are suitable for it.

example.ex: He had just given a trial to a young woman who said she had previous experience...
example.tran: 他刚给了一位声称自己有从业经验的年轻女子一次试用机会。

example.ex: The 26-year old fullback has been on trial at the club for ten days.
example.tran: 那位 26 岁的后卫已经在该俱乐部试用 10 天了。

entry.def: If you refer to the trials of a situation, you mean the unpleasant things that you experience in it.
In some sports or outdoor activities, trials are a series of contests that test a competitor's skill and ability.

example.ex: He has been riding in horse trials for less than a year.
example.tran: 他参加赛马选拔赛还不到一年。

entry.def: If you do something by trial and error, you try several different methods of doing it until you find the method that works properly.
entry.tran: 通过反复试验；经过不断摸索

example.ex: Many drugs were found by trial and error...
example.tran: 很多药物都是通过反复试验才发现的。

example.ex: She feels that raising her children has been a matter of trial and error.
example.tran: 她感到抚养孩子就像是摸着石头过河。

entry.def: If someone is on trial, they are being tried in a court of law.

example.ex: He is currently on trial accused of serious drugs charges...
example.tran: 他目前正因严重的毒品控罪而受审。

example.ex: He will go on trial later this month charged with murder…
example.tran: 他将因谋杀罪名在本月晚些时候出庭受审。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is on trial, you mean that they are in a situation where people are observing them to see whether they succeed or fail.
entry.tran: 在测试中;在考察中;在考验中

example.ex: The President will be drawn into a damaging battle in which his credentials will be on trial.
example.tran: 总统将被卷入一场造成负面影响的争斗中，他的资格会因此受到考验。

entry.def: If someone stands trial, they are tried in court for a crime they are accused of.

example.ex: He was found to be mentally unfit to stand trial…
example.tran: 他被判定精神状况不宜接受审判。

example.ex: Five people are to stand trial for murder.
example.tran: 将有 5 个人因涉嫌谋杀受到审判。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) legal proceedings consisting of the judicial examination of issues by a competent tribunal;

sentences.sentence: "most of these complaints are settled before they go to trial"
"in the experimental trials the amount of carbon was measured separately"
"he called each flip of the coin a new trial"

means.word_mean: 3. (sports) a preliminary competition to determine qualifications;

sentences.sentence: "the trials for the semifinals began yesterday"

means.word_mean: 4. (law) the determination of a person's innocence or guilt by due process of law;

sentences.sentence: "he had a fair trial and the jury found him guilty"

means.word_mean: 5. trying something to find out about it;

sentences.sentence: "a sample for ten days free trial"
"a trial of progesterone failed to relieve the pain"

means.word_mean: 6. an annoying or frustrating or catastrophic event;

sentences.sentence: "his mother-in-law's visits were a great trial for him"
"he survived the great test of battle"
"candidates must compete in a trial of skill"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun): from Anglo-Norman French, or from medieval Latin triallum. The verb dates from the 1980s

sentences.cn: 它始终是精简,从一个想法, 模具, 试验样本, 改进和结束与正式生产.
sentences.en: It is always starter from an idea, mold, trial sample, improvement and ended with formal production.

sentences.cn: 经生产性试验取得了良好的效果.
sentences.en: The bits were proven good through trial.

sentences.cn: 经工业试验,试制出轻质、高强的绝热材料,经济、社会效益显著.
sentences.en: Through industrial trial production, the light and high strength insulation material has been successfully manufactured.

sentences.cn: 田间药效试验结果表明,对香蕉叶斑病有较好的防效.
sentences.en: Field efficacy trials indicated relativity good control of banana sigatoka leaf spot disease.

sentences.cn: 伊蓝开发的一种被动免疫疗法,已进入第二阶段的临床试验.
sentences.en: A passive immunization treatment developed by Elan Corporation has already advanced to phase II clinical trials.

sentences.cn: 方法在实验室内,采用模拟现场试验及现场试验方法对其杀菌效果进行检测.
sentences.en: Methods Simulated field trial and field trial were carried out to detect its germicidal efficacy.

sentences.cn: 他们采取了一种反复试验的程序.
sentences.en: A trial invalid because of basic prejudicial error in procedure.

sentences.cn: 导致观察性研究和大规模随机临床试验结果之间不一致的可能原因有多种.
sentences.en: There are multiple possible reasons for discrepant results between observational studies and large randomized trials.

sentences.cn: 随机试验:比较针灸降低血压的作用.
sentences.en: Randomized Trial of Acupuncture to Lower Blood Pressure.

sentences.cn: 这种做法已在动物身上治愈了致命的肺动脉高血压症,人体临床试验正展开中.
sentences.en: This method has cured fatal pulmonary hypertension in animals and is entering human trials.

sentences.cn: Geron的临床试验设计8到10名脊柱严重受损的患者.
sentences.en: Geron's trial will involve 8 to 10 people with severe spinal cord injuries.

sentences.cn: 我们将进一步试验这部机器.
sentences.en: We shall put the machine to further trial.

sentences.cn: 这项C反应蛋白的最新研究对去年出版的一本叫做JUPITER的临床试验资料也提出了质疑.
sentences.en: This latest CRP study also raises questions about a clinical trial published last year called JUPITER.

sentences.cn: 试验之前应记录船的吃水、风向 、 风速以及水流等情况.
sentences.en: Before trial should record draft, wind directionwind speed, current and etc.

sentences.cn: 伯朗什: 是怎么一个试验过程?
sentences.en: BLANCH : What type of trial was conducted?

sentences.cn: 一般说来, 设计过程不是一帆风顺的,而需要反复试验.
sentences.en: In general, the design procedure is not straightforward and will require trial and error.

sentences.cn: 他把每次掷硬币称为一次试验.
sentences.en: He called each flip of the coin a new trial.

sentences.cn: 这个包括有4,000名受试者的试验结果在2005年进行整合分析.
sentences.en: The results from both trials, which included nearly 4,000 women, were combined and analyzed in 2005.

sentences.cn: 他们正在做一种新药物的临床试验.
sentences.en: They are doing clinical trials on a new drug.

sentences.cn: 以前的随机试验并没有集中在具有临床依据的胆道梗阻患者.
sentences.en: Preious randomized trials hae not focused on subgroup of patients with clinical evidence of biliopancreatic obstruction.

sentences.cn: 与试验方法相比,数值计算方法具有自身的优点与发展潜力.
sentences.en: CFD has its superiority and potential fordeveloping with contrast to trial method.

sentences.cn: 因此,我们已经有效地在15个位试验中获得了四个独立的12位转换.
sentences.en: Therefore we have effectively gained four independent 12 bit conversions in 15 bit trials.

sentences.cn: 在初步人体试验, 不孕夫妇服用维生素E后能显著增加生育能力.
sentences.en: In a preliminary human trial, infertile couples given vitamin E showed a significant increase in fertility.

sentences.cn: 临床试验正在检验其对结肠癌, 银屑病, 与阿尔茨海默病的安全性和有效性.
sentences.en: Clinical trials are checking its safety and effectiveness for colon cancer, psoriasis, and Alzheimer's disease.

sentences.cn: 审讯是在去年五月开始, 以苏格兰法律在荷兰进行.
sentences.en: The trial began last May. It is taking place in the Netherlands under Scottish law.

sentences.cn: 对那个囚犯的审讯简直是胡闹.
sentences.en: The prisoner's trial was a farce.

sentences.cn: 不过,在正常的刑事审讯中,猜疑永不能构成作出合理推论的基础.
sentences.en: But suspicion can never be a suitable basis for rational inferences in a criminal trial.

sentences.cn: 在日本宪兵队,审讯他的是一个日本少佐和一个姓金的翻译.
sentences.en: Military police in Japan, his trial is a surname in Japan and a goldshao zuo translation.

sentences.cn: 事情看来不会向好的方向发展因为正式审讯日期已经确定.
sentences.en: Things don't go well and a trial date is set.

sentences.cn: 南北战争时期, 人身保护法遭到践踏, 民事审判被军事审讯所代替.
sentences.en: During the Civil War, writes of corpus, and civil trials gave way to military trials.

sentences.cn: 审讯暂停一星期[下星期继续进行].
sentences.en: The trial was adjourned for a week / until the following week.

sentences.cn: 在新疆, 对于维吾尔族分离主义的审讯和处决在继续进行着.
sentences.en: In Xinjiang, trials and executions of Uighurs charged with separatism continued.

sentences.cn: 那一审讯不公开[那一案件已秘密审讯].
sentences.en: The trial was held / The case was heard in camera.

sentences.cn: 被告律师对出席审讯的证人事先作了仔细的指导.
sentences.en: The witness at the trial had been carefully primed by defence lawyers.

sentences.cn: 审讯之后,他向我们透露了真实细节.
sentences.en: After the trial he gave us the real details.

sentences.cn: 联邦劳动党的首领马克说,他不支持扩大对海洛因注射的审讯.
sentences.en: Federal Labor leader Mark Latham says he does not support extending a heroin injecting room trial.

sentences.cn: 宣言还宣称公司参与集会和审讯的权利.
sentences.en: It also declared an individual's right to a fair and speedy trial.

sentences.cn: 有关部门希望这次审讯能够结束波及全国范围的不光彩的毒奶粉事件.
sentences.en: Authorities hope the trials will end what was widely seen in China as a national disgrace.

sentences.cn: 最后, 虽然像陪审团审讯一样,上诉是被允许的, 但是却很少发生.
sentences.en: Finally, although appeals are allowed, like jury trials, they do not occur very often.

sentences.cn: 审讯将延期至10月9日.
sentences.en: The trial was adjourned until October 9 th.

sentences.cn: 奥利维耶因此案多次受到审讯, 最终放弃顽抗, 于2005年2月供出丈夫罪行.
sentences.en: Olivier repeatedly in the trial , therefore, finally abandoned recalcitrant, in February 2005 her husband admitted crimes.

sentences.cn: 在这场将会吸引全香港关注的审讯中, 笔迹专家和风水师也将出庭作证.
sentences.en: In a trial that is set to captivate Hong Kong, handwriting experts gurus will also testify.

sentences.cn: 每次审讯中,总统的支持者们都会进来威胁我和我的律师.
sentences.en: In every trial the President's supporter came and threatened me and my lawyer.

sentences.cn: 萨达姆?侯赛因连同其他七人一起被审讯.
sentences.en: Saddam Hussein is on trial with seven other men.

sentences.cn: 西班牙当局要把他押送回国审讯 吗 ?
sentences.en: Will the Spanish authorities send him home for trial?

sentences.cn: 他在受审讯.
sentences.en: He is on trial.

sentences.cn: 审讯的报告是从速记员的速记本上转录过来的.
sentences.en: The account of the trial was transcribed from the stenographer's shorthand notes.

sentences.cn: 由于发现了一名新的重要证人,辩护律师决定申请重新开庭审讯.
sentences.en: The defense lawyer decided to for a new trial when they found an important new witness.

sentences.cn: 在整个审讯过程中他始终不失尊严.
sentences.en: He maintained his dignity throughout the trial.

sentences.cn: 在审讯中, 法官必须确定哪些目击者可信哪些不可信.
sentences.en: In a trial, a judge must decide which eyewitnesses to believe and which not to believe.

sentences.cn: 他的名字在整个的审讯中被提到了几次 呢 ?
sentences.en: How many times was he named in this trial?

sentences.cn: 她因涉嫌诈骗将受到审判。
sentences.en: She will stand trial/go on trial for fraud.

sentences.cn: 这些人已被逮捕但并未送交法院审判。
sentences.en: The men were arrested but not brought to trial .

sentences.cn: 她因被控贪污正等候审判。
sentences.en: She is awaiting trial on corruption charges.

sentences.cn: 他没有受到公正的审判。
sentences.en: He did not receive a fair trial.

sentences.cn: 他因被控密谋颠覆国家正等待军事法庭的审判。
sentences.en: He's awaiting trial in a military court on charges of plotting against the state...

sentences.cn: 他被判定精神状况不宜接受审判。
sentences.en: He was found to be mentally unfit to stand trial…

sentences.cn: 将有 5 个人因涉嫌谋杀受到审判。
sentences.en: Five people are to stand trial for murder.

sentences.cn: 其他人还在等待审判。
sentences.en: Others await trial.

sentences.cn: 在许多方面,道德目的的缺失不仅体现在如此广泛的电话窃听事实上,更体现在审判中的辩词上。  【
sentences.en: In many respects, the dearth of moral purpose frames not only the fact of such widespread phone hacking but the terms on which the trial took place .

sentences.cn: 高等法院的决议认为,对麦克唐纳先生进行审判的法官并未告知陪审团必须只关注其“公务行为”，或者是这位前州长在与其职责相关的“特殊的”和“未解决的”问题上的决定。
sentences.en: The high court's decision said the judge in Mr. McDonnell’s trial failed to tell a jury that it must look only at his “official acts,” or the former governor’s decisions on“specific” and “unsettled” issues related to his duties.

sentences.cn: 再说, 设立环保审判法庭, 也是国际上许多国家的通行做法.
sentences.en: Moreover, the trial court to set up environmental protection, is also the practice in many countries.

sentences.cn: 那名囚犯被提交审判.
sentences.en: The prisoner was committed for trial.

sentences.cn: 因此,对科维尔的审判可能是在掩人耳目,不过,对于这家大型法国银行而言,这仍然非常令人尴尬.
sentences.en: So perhaps the Kerviel trial is after all albeit very embarrassing for the large French bank.

sentences.cn: 这个课程将检视在欧洲及美洲历史上一些出名的审判.
sentences.en: This seminar examines a number of famous trials in European and American history.

sentences.cn: 他得到了一场公正的审判,陪审团认为他有罪.
sentences.en: He had a fair trial and the jury found him guilty.

sentences.cn: 那些曾经无法无天的政治家们也因腐败而受到审判.
sentences.en: Politicians once thought untouchable have been brought to trial for corruption.

sentences.cn: 像现在这样,人们就会问,这个审判到底公不公正?
sentences.en: Now people are wondering whether this trial was conducted fairly or not.

sentences.cn: 那次审判简直是胡闹.
sentences.en: The trial was a mere farce.

sentences.cn: 在案件审判前一天,双方当事人达成和解协议.
sentences.en: The parties reached a settlement the day before trial.

sentences.cn: 由陪审团审判的权利被确立于我们的法律制度中.
sentences.en: The right to trial by jury is entrenched in our legal system.

sentences.cn: 他选择了陪审审判.
sentences.en: He chose to stand trial by jury.

sentences.cn: 在审判中他出庭作证.
sentences.en: He appeared as a witness in the trial.

sentences.cn: 我怎么知道蚂蚁也有感觉有家庭有审判 呢 ?
sentences.en: How was l supposed to know ants had feelings or families or trials?

sentences.cn: 第八章审判程序.
sentences.en: Chapter VIII Trial Procedures.

sentences.cn: 有时,米哈伊尔?K(译者注:也就是霍多尔科夫斯基)的审判也充满了卡夫卡色彩.
sentences.en: At times the trials of Mikhail K have been almost Kafkaesque.

sentences.cn: 人民法院实行公开审判制度.
sentences.en: The people's courts carry out a public trial system.

sentences.cn: 后来, 他们还是把耶稣抓起来审判他.
sentences.en: Later , however, they arrested the Lord Jesus and brought Him to trial.

sentences.cn: 今天的审判在原告的开场陈述中继续下去.
sentences.en: The trial continues today with the opening statement from the prosecution.

sentences.cn: 罪犯未经审判就被监禁了.
sentences.en: Criminals were jugged without a trial.

sentences.cn: 当年辛普森杀妻案的审判就说明,再也没什么能比谋杀和名人的组合更能引发公众的集体亢奋了.
sentences.en: The OJ Simpson trial proved that nothing as excited as murder and celebrity.

sentences.cn: 经过了许多考验和磨难之后, 我们终于到达了目的地.
sentences.en: After many trials and tribulations, we finally reached our destination.

sentences.cn: 历经磨难之后, 他终于悟出了人生的真谛.
sentences.en: After a series of trials, he finally understood the truth of life.

sentences.cn: 我不能不注意到,你们有些人经历了巨大的痛苦和磨难来到这里.
sentences.en: I am unmindful that some of you have come here out of great trials and tribulations.

sentences.cn: 人生充满着磨难.
sentences.en: Life is full of trials.

sentences.cn: 生活充满了小小的烦恼、磨难和不公正的事情.
sentences.en: Life is full of minor irritations and trials and injustices.

sentences.cn: 她是一个可爱的金发女郎, 却也承认她生命中磨难的根源就是她自己那只鼻子.
sentences.en: An adorable blonde, she admitted that the trial of her life was her nose.

sentences.cn: 这就是我的考验和磨难开始的地方.
sentences.en: This is where my trials and tribulations began.

sentences.cn: 他泰然地承受着种种磨难.
sentences.en: He bears his trials with longanimity.

sentences.cn: 氏族成员在他们处于忧患困难之时彼此相互援助.
sentences.en: In their trials and difficulties the members of the gens assisted each other.

sentences.cn: 困难和考验总会过去的.
sentences.en: Hardships and trials come and go.

sentences.cn: 经过磨练, 他已经可以独立应对工作中的各种困难了.
sentences.en: After trials, now he can face all the difficulties at work independently.

sentences.cn: 那时,中国的经济经历一场困难的考验, 将会显示出更强大的生命力.
sentences.en: After we standing the difficult trial, I believe the Chinese economy will display even stronger vitality.

sentences.cn: 奥林匹克运动会选拔赛
sentences.en: Olympic trials

sentences.cn: 他参加赛马选拔赛还不到一年。
sentences.en: He has been riding in horse trials for less than a year.

sentences.cn: 这次选拔赛很重要, 你一定要加油 啊 !
sentences.en: This selective trial is very important. You must do your best!

sentences.cn: 埃尔文将不会参加周三的奥运选拔赛, 尽管他的报名成绩依然很有竞争力.
sentences.en: Ervin will not compete at the Olympic trials Wednesday, although his qualifying time still stands.

sentences.cn: 你昨天看到奥运选手的选拔赛吗?
sentences.en: Did you watch the Olympic trials yesterday.

sentences.cn: 他已通过了选拔赛.
sentences.en: He's passed the trials.

sentences.cn: 她在选拔赛中的表现得到了赞赏。
sentences.en: She won admiration for her comportment during the trial.

sentences.cn: 如果选拔赛双方打平，报界可能会使形势朝着不利于他们的方向倾斜。
sentences.en: If the trial were evenly poised the newspapers might tip the balance against them.

sentences.cn: 他参加赛马选拔赛还不到一年。
sentences.en: He has been riding in horse trials for less than a year.

sentences.cn: 虽然试验的形状, 我很快就意识到最好的设计创造了通过试验和错误.
sentences.en: While experimenting with shapes, I quickly realized the best designs were created through trial and error.

sentences.cn: 什么人来监控我的护理、安全和评价试验的结果?
sentences.en: Who will monitor my care and safety, and review the trial?

sentences.cn: 对新的原料药, 第11.6节通常不适于临床试验的前期阶段.
sentences.en: For new APIs, Section 11.6 does not normally apply in early stages of clinical trials.

sentences.cn: 及时了解SFDA最新颁布的有关临床试验的法律法规.
sentences.en: Update the relevant regulation for clinical trial published authority and SFDA.

sentences.cn: 他们采取了一种反复试验的程序.
sentences.en: A trial invalid because of basic prejudicial error in procedure.

sentences.en: Efficacy results for the pivotal pancreatic cancer trial are summarized in the following paragraphs.

sentences.cn: 结论:饮食体重减轻试验的可变性可能部分归咎于对激素反应的差异.
sentences.en: Conclusions Variability in dietary weight loss trials may be partially attributable to differences in hormonal response.

sentences.cn: 有高危险因素的正在进行临床试验的病人,可以给化疗.
sentences.en: For high risk patients ( criteria defined in discussion ) inclusion a clinical trial is recommended.

sentences.cn: 用试验的手段证明了这些抑振措施的作用和效果.
sentences.en: Finally it proved action and effect of those confine way by trial.

sentences.cn: 本初期研究可供为大规模临床试验的基础.
sentences.en: This pilot study will serve as a basis for a much larger clinical trial.

sentences.cn: 不过一些人认为应减少对人体试验的依赖.
sentences.en: But many said there should be less dependence on human trials.

sentences.cn: 试验的目的是决定船舶保证航向的能力.
sentences.en: The aim of the trial is to determine the ability of maintenance vessel course.

sentences.cn: 西瓜育种试验的鉴定和调查结果的处理.
sentences.en: Evaluation of trials and processing of trial results.

sentences.cn: 全自动乳腺超声筛查试验的一期试验结果也在本次会议上进行了展示.
sentences.en: Phase I results from ABUS screening trial were presented earlier in the session as well.

sentences.cn: 这一发现为临床肿瘤疫苗试验的合理设计提供了依据.
sentences.en: This provides the groundwork for the rational design of cancer vaccines for clinical trials.

sentences.cn: 美国联邦保安官汤尼班尼特正在督导这试验的安全性.
sentences.en: US marshal Tony Bennet is overseeing security for the trial.

sentences.cn: 参与阿司匹林治疗无症状性动脉硬化试验的3350名50岁以上老年人.
sentences.en: Participants 3350 men and women aged over 50 participating in the aspirin for asymptomatic atherosclerosis trial.

sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳·麦考密克也从圣巴巴拉搬来,以便随时了解试验的最新进展.
sentences.en: Katharine McCormick moved east from Santa Barbara to keep close tabs on the trials.

sentences.cn: 那是一个反复试验的过程.
sentences.en: It was a process of trial and error.

sentences.cn: Klein先生称首个该类人类试验的批准是 “ 一个令人出乎意料的标准 ”
sentences.en: Mr. Klein called the approval of the first human trial of this sort " an extraordinary benchmark. "

sentences.cn: 因此, 对临床试验的妥善管理是摆在临床研究工作者 、 医院管理者面前不容回避的问题.
sentences.en: To manage clinical trials properly, therefore, has became an urgent issue for the hospital administrators.

sentences.cn: 临床试验的证据为这些脑损伤患者开启了新的希望之窗.
sentences.en: Evidence from clinical trials offers fresh hope for those affected by brain trauma.

sentences.cn: 近来试验的结果让我们对产品的预期产生了阴影.
sentences.en: The results from the recent trials casted a cloud on our expectations of the product.

sentences.cn: 生物标记物还能用于鉴别临床试验的合适病人群体.
sentences.en: Biomarkers can also be used to identify appropriate patient groups for clinical trials.

sentences.cn: 麦卡锡被要求对第一阶段疫苗试验的数据作出分析。
sentences.en: McCarthy was asked to analyse the data from the first phase of trials of the vaccine.

sentences.cn: 在整个审讯的过程中,她那端庄的举止使得每个人都相信她是无辜的.
sentences.en: Her dignified bearing throughout the trial made everyone believe she was innocent.

sentences.cn: 被告律师对出席审讯的证人事先作了仔细的指导.
sentences.en: The witness at the trial had been carefully primed by defence lawyers.

sentences.cn: 宣言还宣称公司参与集会和审讯的权利.
sentences.en: It also declared an individual's right to a fair and speedy trial.

sentences.cn: 审讯的报告是从速记员的速记本上转录过来的.
sentences.en: The account of the trial was transcribed from the stenographer's shorthand notes.

sentences.cn: 行政介入将扰乱法庭审讯的正常程序.
sentences.en: Ministerial intervention will disrupt the normal process of the court trial.

sentences.cn: 美国官员对审判表示满意, 但批评者质疑审讯的公正性.
sentences.en: US officials were satisfied with the trial, while critics said the a sham.
